title: Improving Mental Health Support through AI-Powered Chatbots1
content:
With rising concerns about the accessibility of mental health care, AI-based virtual assistants are gaining attention as an effective means of offering scalable assistance. This paper outlines the development and structure of intelligent dialogue systems that leverage curated therapeutic conversation data.

The virtual assistant is capable of delivering responsive emotional support, analyzing user sentiment, and guiding individuals to relevant self-help tools. Although not a replacement for licensed therapists, feedback from users suggests these systems enhance the availability of mental health services and offer prompt help when required.
